about_the_game:
Unravel the Past. Change the Future.

A doomed civilization. A future in ruins. A chance to change everything.

Sent back in time with a single mission—investigate the past and present your findings—your goal is to document history before it’s too late. Using advanced tools, you’ll capture key moments, uncover hidden anomalies, and attempt to warn those who still have time to act. But will they listen?

Blending open-world exploration with photography-driven gameplay, this game invites you to traverse a vast and immersive landscape, analyze events as they unfold, and piece together the mystery of an impending catastrophe. Every discovery matters, and every choice shapes the outcome.

Features

  • Investigate and Document – Use high-tech photography tools to analyze key moments in history.

  • Expansive Open World – Explore diverse biomes, uncover lost civilizations, and interact with a world unaware of its fate.

  • Capture Critical Events – Record anomalies, track pivotal changes, and create a visual archive of history in motion.

  • Dynamic Storytelling – Your findings influence how the past reacts. Can you convince them to change course?

  • Collection and Progression – Gather artifacts, upgrade your equipment, and unlock deeper secrets hidden in the timeline.

The future is broken, but the past holds the key. Will you find the answers before time runs out?

name: Prepare The Past

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7400 CPU @ 3.00GHz 3.00 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Microsoft GS Wavetable Synth
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8650U CPU @ 1.90GHz 2.11 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Microsoft GS Wavetable Synth

short_description: John has been sent from the future with a critical mission: to investigate the timeline and reveal his findings to the people of the past. Their future is doomed, but with his knowledge, they might have a chance to change it—and save themselves.
